channel.title: Abyss - The New Age of Private Servers
channel.description:
[size=16pt][font=verdana][b][center][url=http://abyss-rs.com][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4YNEaOK.png[/img][/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/njglR4Q.png[/img] [url=http://abyss-rs.com]Abyss[/url], A new age in private servers. We've been online for six months so far and have released over 500 updates in that time period. We are an economy based server that aims to be as unique as possible. Abyss is a second chance for people whom have given up on private servers. We are not a dictatorship, but a family. The community is among the best anyone could hope for and we base our updates around the community in result of that. Our server aims to be very unique, but it also acts as a reminder of what RuneScape used to be and what it could have been. We have people who are alone, socially unaccepted, sad, happy, people who like sports, nerds, people who hack others for a living, people who work for charity, etc.. Anyone, no matter what their background or past may involve, can enjoy something at the end of the day. Something special. That is what Abyss is.
Website: http://abyss-rs.com
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dw8NQ5C.png[/img]
Hank - Abyss Founder/Source Developer/Website Developer Ocyn - Client Developer FiveRiverFlo - Source Developer Lennard - Source Developer Senne - Source Developer
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JhQWefp.png[/img]
Balanced Combat triangle Enough bosses for you to stay entertained including unique monsters with special abilities for more intense fights! All the basic minigames -> Duel Arena, Barrows, Warrior's Guild, Pest Control, Fight Caves, Fight Pits Dicing Entertaining and challenging (custom) quests Unique party skilling system -> Skilling in groups makes it alot more fun! Social Slayer Player Owned Shops -> fully working, no dupes at all Extemely stable performance server and client All skills are working great excluding Hunter and Construction Custom Dungoneering Summoning New Server - New Economy -> Opportunity for you to get one of the richest players! Miasmic spells working perfectly with slow effect. Easy, Medium, and Elite Slayer Tasks Daily updates with new content ~ every week Active and mature staff team to help you with every problem possible Enough logs and backups to prevent problems Skillers are important -> Not all potions/food/misc are in shops. Unique prestige system Cute and scary pets Curses Achievements Encouraging pking by placing bosses in Wilderness
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0aDC1q2.png[/img]
Fully customized construction/property system. Hunter (Last skill that needs written). A new client release fixing some of our current issues. All minigames/extras.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zi58Ysc.png[/img] Latest updates:
[SPOILER=08/03/2014]
Treasure trails have arrived! * [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/boWsxAN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N6rDeEG.png[/img] -> VERY RARE * Have fun hunting! * * More details: * * ALL mobs drop clues, difficulty depends on their level * For now there are only anagram and map clues. * Many reward items are still bugged. They may go into the wrong equipment slot or look weird. This will all be fixed in time*if you report it in the bugs section on our forums! * Some reward items do not work yet, for example firelighters. These will also be added soon! * As the clue system is brand new there will be bugs. Please do your best to find them so that we may perfect them! * Easy, medium, and hard difficulties are added so far. Elite hasn't been added yet.
Go check them all out [URL=http://"http://abyss-rs.com/community/topic/131-treasure-trails/"]here[/URL]! [/SPOILER]
[color=#FF0000]Upcoming updates: Our custom version of Nex:[/color] [SPOILER=Nex] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cGcyVji.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p8Mkf6Y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a7o7N3u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0GyrCWR.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IHqXUrd.png[/img] [color=#FF0000]Give your support by adding this logo to your signature![/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CF4CM14.png[/img]
[SPOILER=MEDIA][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ydzNMOG.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eKpcbET.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JqI77D6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oOxr5ub.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mYZNRYJ.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dhrg4J0.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SnD0gyU.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0s3lfIG.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VzohuMq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/plvlwST.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3359084151.png[/img][/SPOILER][/center][/b][/font][/size]

item.title: Abyss - The New Age of Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @birdhouse919 birdhouse919
item.description:
@birdhouse919 wrote:

DevilXsummoner:

I’m looking for a server to call home. I hope this could be it.

I hope you find it an enjoyable server.
Feel free to give us suggestions on our forum so that we can make the game-play more enjoyable for you as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Abyss - The New Age of Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @birdhouse919 birdhouse919
item.description:
@birdhouse919 wrote:

[size=16pt][font=verdana][b][center]


Abyss, A new age in private servers. We’ve been online for six months so far and have released over 500 updates in that time period. We are an economy based server that aims to be as unique as possible. Abyss is a second chance for people whom have given up on private servers. We are not a dictatorship, but a family. The community is among the best anyone could hope for and we base our updates around the community in result of that. Our server aims to be very unique, but it also acts as a reminder of what RuneScape used to be and what it could have been. We have people who are alone, socially unaccepted, sad, happy, people who like sports, nerds, people who hack others for a living, people who work for charity, etc… Anyone, no matter what their background or past may involve, can enjoy something at the end of the day. Something special. That is what Abyss is.

Website: http://abyss-rs.com

Hank - Abyss Founder/Source Developer/Website Developer
Ocyn - Client Developer
FiveRiverFlo - Source Developer
Lennard - Source Developer
Senne - Source Developer

Balanced Combat triangle
Enough bosses for you to stay entertained including unique monsters with special abilities for more intense fights!
All the basic minigames -> Duel Arena, Barrows, Warrior’s Guild, Pest Control, Fight Caves, Fight Pits
Dicing
Entertaining and challenging (custom) quests
Unique party skilling system -> Skilling in groups makes it alot more fun!
Social Slayer
Player Owned Shops -> fully working, no dupes at all
Extemely stable performance server and client
All skills are working great excluding Hunter and Construction
Custom Dungoneering
Summoning
New Server - New Economy -> Opportunity for you to get one of the richest players!
Miasmic spells working perfectly with slow effect.
Easy, Medium, and Elite Slayer Tasks
Daily updates with new content ~ every week
Active and mature staff team to help you with every problem possible
Enough logs and backups to prevent problems
Skillers are important -> Not all potions/food/misc are in shops.
Unique prestige system
Cute and scary pets
Curses
Achievements
Encouraging pking by placing bosses in Wilderness

Fully customized construction/property system.
Hunter (Last skill that needs written).
A new client release fixing some of our current issues.
All minigames/extras.


Latest updates:

[SPOILER=08/03/2014]

Treasure trails have arrived!
*
-> VERY RARE
*
Have fun hunting!
*
*
More details:
*

  • ALL mobs drop clues, difficulty depends on their level
  • For now there are only anagram and map clues.
  • Many reward items are still bugged. They may go into the wrong equipment slot or look weird. This will all be fixed in time*if you report it in the bugs section on our forums!
  • Some reward items do not work yet, for example firelighters. These will also be added soon!
  • As the clue system is brand new there will be bugs. Please do your best to find them so that we may perfect them!
  • Easy, medium, and hard difficulties are added so far. Elite hasn’t been added yet.

Go check them all out [URL=http://“http://abyss-rs.com/community/topic/131-treasure-trails/”]here[/URL]!
[/SPOILER]

[color=#FF0000]Upcoming updates:
Our custom version of Nex:[/color]
[SPOILER=Nex]



[/SPOILER]


[color=#FF0000]Give your support by adding this logo to your signature![/color]

[SPOILER=MEDIA]

[/SPOILER][/center][/b][/font][/size]

Read full topic
item.source: Abyss - The New Age of Private Servers
